verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How firm a foundation, ye saints of the Lord Is laid for your faith in His excellent word! What more can He say than to you He has said, To you who for refuge to Jesus have fled?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Fear not, I am with you, O be not dismayed, For I am your God, and will still give you aid. I’ll strengthen you, help you, and cause you to stand, Upheld by My righteous omnipotent hand.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The soul that on Jesus has leaned for repose I will not, I will not forsake to its foes. That soul, though all hell should endeavor to shake I’ll never, no never, no never forsake.{/lang-eng}
